casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Dalton Dewayne FLOWERS 332P19-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 23, 2019

Guy J. Loranger, Attorney at Law, For Flowers, Dalton Dewayne

Michael E. Bulleri, Assistant Attorney General, For State of North Carolina

Michael Bonfoey, District Attorney, For State of North Carolina

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 23rd of August 2019 by Defendant for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 23rd of August 2019."
